text: The Mike Douglas Show was an American daytime television talk show. The host Mike Douglas. The show was broadcast in syndication from 1961 to 1982. Westinghouse Broadcasting distributed the show. Many of the programs were made in studios of two of the company's TV stations. ==Guests== The show featured the first television appearance of then 2 year old Tiger Woods who showed off his swing for Bob Hope and James Stewart.
